enabled.name: Enable Module
enabled.hint: When unchecked disables all functionality of this module

combat-prefix.name: Combat Playlist Prefix
combat-prefix.hint: Prefix for all your combat playlists to pull from

combat-prep-playlist.name: Combat Preparations Playlist Name
combat-prep-playlist.hint: Input the name of the playlist you wish to play when the combat tracker has been added but the combat hasn't begun yet.

enabled.name: Play Victory playlist after combat?
enabled.hint: When enabled plays the specified victory playlist after combat

playlist.name: Victory Playlist
playlist.hint: Name of the playlist to play when combat is ended

duration.name: Play the victory song for...
duration.hint: How long in seconds to play the victory playlist for, 0 means it will never be automatically stopped

mood-prefix.name: Mood Playlist Prefix
mood-prefix.hint: Prefix for all your mood playlists to pull from

size.name: Track Title Size
size.hint: Size scaling of the track title that shows if you have it enabled in the playlist settings (Default is 5)

duration.name: Track Title Duration (s)
duration.hint: How long in seconds to display the track title (Default is 8)

menu.right-click: Right click to change the playlist image

error.no-playlists: No playlists to select from, look at your RHYM module settings to make sure your prefix matches your playlists

show-track-title.name: Show Track Title
show-track-title.hint: When this enabled it will create a small animation showing the track title every time you switch tracks (Note: If you want to have it show an author/album on a lower line use '|' or '-' as a splitter)
